item.title: Ten Steps from Pets to Cattle
item.description: Why do we need DevOps when IT and Operations succeed in their responsibility for security and uptime, using administrative tools to maintain, backup, and restore those systems? Because the operations domain must be documented, democratized, and distributed to achieve agility before Operations returns to become a force multiplier instead of a keep the lights on organization. Let me demonstrate that traditional values for long lived infrastructure and their retroactive justification do not apply when progressing to a DevOps mindset.
